name: Ant Madness
description:
Ant Madness is a ¾ perspective multiplayer game where two ants must team up to rescue other ants from angry beetles who invaded the ant colony trying to steal Ant Larvae.

To the right, there are images that include Player 1 Myrth and Player 2 Ulfhild! Together they are to protect their community of ants, larvae, and their lovely Queen Edme from the Beetle King Fazas.
